titles.title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Flanders, New York.
To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Flanders, New York.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

bill.summary: Requires the United States Postal Service (USPS) to designate a single, unique zip code applicable to the area encompassing only Flanders, New York.
